title: What to Expect from the Upcoming Hytale Beta
excerpt: The Hytale community is buzzing with anticipation. We summarize everything confirmed so far about the beta phase, recruitment, and what vanilla survivalists should look for.
content:
As we approach the launch of the Hytale beta, many players are wondering what the experience will look like for traditional survival fans. Hypixel Studios has been tight-lipped, but we can piece together some vital details from recent blog posts.

Beta Access

Beta access will likely be rolled out in phases. Initial testers will focus on technical stability, while later phases will open up the world to more creative and survival testing.
